entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage

action.name: Dissolver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) acid damage

trait.name: Spores
entries: When struck by an attack, the Sporangia expels spores. All creatures within 10 ft. of the Sporangia must make a {@dc 16} constitution saving throw or take 5({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: Corrosive
entries: A creature that touches the Megalium or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the Megalium corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the Megalium is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Pseudopod Tendrils
entries: The Magalium has as many tendrils as player characters. Each tendril has unlimited range to hit and the Megalium can attack with each on its turn.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Rough Terrain
entries: Any area the swarm occupies is considered rough terrain

trait.name: Acidic Touch
entries: Any creature within the swarm's area take 1 acid damage at the start of their turn. Any part of an object, surface, or creature touched by the swarm is cleaned.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check

monster.name: Sentinel
languages: All languages known by piloting Beholder

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Sentinel's weapon attacks are magical

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Sentinel is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form. It also protects its pilot

trait.name: Large Stature
entries: The Sentinel's ranged attacks do not suffer disadvantage when adjacent to a hostile creature unless its size is Large or larger

trait.name: Powered Suit
entries: Without a Beholder pilot the Sentinel is inanimate. While piloted, then Sentinel shares the Intellect, Wisdom, and Charisma scores of the Beholder. It also shares any proficiency in skills related to these attributes and any languages known by the piloting Beholder. whenever the Sentinel is subjected to psychic damage, this damage is passed to the pilot. If unpiloted, the Sentinel is immune to psychic damage. Any mental effect imposed on the Sentinel, like being charmed or exhausted, is passed on to the pilot. The pilot's immunities, resistances, and abilities apply.

trait.name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
entries: The Sentinel is surrounded by a faintly shimmering magical sphere 20 ft. in every direction when powered. Any spell of 3rd level or below is dispelled when it passes through this barrier. If targeted by {@spell Dispel Magic}, this barrier is disabled for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sentinel makes one {@i Trident} and one {@i Empowered Beams} attack.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage

action.name: Empowered Beams
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit +6} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Realm Teleport
entries: Horan magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, to any location within his domain. Teleporting with this method begins as a bonus action and takes 1 minute to perpare. At the end of the minute, Horan teleports. Horan can attack and act normally while preparing this ability.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Horan's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit +9} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8+2}) piercing damage

ac.condition: when blind, paralyzed, petrified, unconscious, or attacked from behind

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The Beastmaster is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the Beastmaster's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Beast Speech
entries: The Beastmaster can speak with and understand beasts.

trait.name: Beast Strength
entries: The Beastmaster has advantage on Strength Checks.

trait.name: Prowess
entries: Twice per round, the Beastmaster can attempt to catch a melee or ranged weapon attack against him. The Beastmaster must be able to see the attack and it cannot originate from directly behind him. Roll a d4. On a 2 or higher, the Beastmaster deflects teh attack and takes no damage.

trait.name: Directional Defense
entries: The Beastmaster has an Armor Class of 19 for any attack he can see originating from in front or sides. If the Beastmaster is blind, paralyzed, petrified, unconscious or attackd from behind, his ArmorClass is 11. The Beastmaster can change his direction after taking damage or as part of his movement.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Beastmaster ames two attacks.

action.name: Punch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage

bonus.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: As a Bonus Action, the Beastmaster can cast {@spell Charm Monster|XGE} or {@spell Polymorph} ({@dc 12}) at will without material components. Any beast targeted by one of these spells fails any saving throws forced by the casting.

trait.name: Infra-Sight
entries: Gurll-Ghohruh can sense the heat of any creature within one mile. This sense is acute enough to determine form, location, and appoximation fo action. Grull-Ghohruh has no eyes and is conventionally blinded aside from this sense.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage

action.name: Slow(3/day)
entries: Grull-Ghohruh breathes a thick, slowing fot 25ft. around itself. Each target in range must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn,m not both. If the target attempts to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, the spell doesn't take effect until the target's next turn, and the target must usi tis action on that run to complete the spell. If it can't, the spell is wasted. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Valkor makes two Spear or Darts attacks or one Rain attack

action.name: Obsidian Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 100 ft., one target. {@h} 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Obsidian Darts
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +9} to hit, range 300/600 ft., one target. {@h} 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Obsidian Rain
entries: Valkor slams his fists on to the ground and causes a rain of obsidian shards to fall in a 100 ft. diameter area he can see within 500ft. All creatures within the area suffer {@h 5} ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage unless under total cover. Ship crews within the area are hit by a +2 Attack and +2 Power attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Stennor's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12},  {@hit +4} to hit wih spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. Telekinesis cast by Stennor only affects objects make of stone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Stennor makes two Hair Bike attacks, one Bite attack, one Petrification Ray attack, and either a Petrification Stone or flesh Stone attack. One bite attack can be replaced with a spell casting.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hair Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Petrification Ray
entries: Stennor chooses one to three targets it can see within 120 ft. The targeted creature must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Petrification Stone
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 45/90 ft., one target. {@h} An inanimate object being worn or carried is turned to stone up to 300 lbs. This attack affects magical items, suppressing their benefits until the change is reversed. Weapons turned to stone deal 1s4 damage and break on an attack dice roll of 5 or less. Armor turned to stone counts as Heavy Armor, gains no benefit from dexterity, and shatters if struck 5 times. Other object effects and which object is changed on a hit is left to the DM's discretion. A {@spell Greater Restoration} spell restores the object to the state it was before being turned.

action.name: Flesh Stone
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 45/90 ft., one target. {@h} An inanimate object being worn or carried adn made of stone is turned to unliving flesh or leather up to 300 lbs. This attack affects magical items, suppressing their benefits until the change is reversed. Weapons turned to flesh are useless. Armor turned to flesh acts as standard leather armor. Other object effects and which object is changed on a hit is left to the DM's discretion. A {@spell Greater Restoration} spell restores the object to the state it was before being turned.

monster.name: Xuu
immune: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Death Incarnate
entries: When Xuu and a creature occupy the same space for the first time during a round, resetting at the start of Xuu's turn, the creature takes 6({@damage 1d6+3}) Necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of Xuu's next turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal
entries: Xuu can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Xuu takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces Xuu to 0 hit points, they must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Xuu drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Touch of the Grave
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. {@h} The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Xuu can only have one creature grappled at a time. Any creature that ends their turn grappled in this manner must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or die.

action.name: Mist Form
entries: Xuu turns into a loose mist up to 2 miles in diameter and shape, expanding around walls and corners. In this form, Xuu appears as a thin fog and is aware of everything within the area they cover. Xuu cannot attack, their {@i Death Incarnate} ability is suppressed, and they also become immune to all damage and conditions while transformed.Xuu can revert their original form as an action in any location within the area occupied.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: At will, I'kok emanates an aura of fear to any creature that can see him within 60 ft. On the start of I'kok's turn, each creature in range must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom save. Creatures within 30 ft. of them make the save at disadvantage. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} and drops anthing being held. On its next turn, the creature must spend its action and movement moving as far from I'kok as possible, following the safest route.

trait.name: Holomire Sculpture
entries: I'kok can spend 1 minute concentrating on a source of Holomire they can see within 30 ft. to sculpt it into somthign new. The source of Holomire can be a pool of raw Holomire, a Rep, or an existing object. I'kok can turn this source into a simple object of Large or smaller size, including a live Rep or reducing it to a raw pool. I'kok can animate objects created by this ability and control them up to 90 ft. away as an action while concentrating.
These objects have HP: 20, AC:12, MV:30 ft., {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, {@damage 1d4} damage. Treat all ability scores as 10

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: I'kok can use its action to {@spell polymorph} into a Larger or small creature with eyes, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die. Regardless of form, I'kok's eyes are red and glow slightly in the dark.

action.name: Chilling Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) necrotic damage and the target can't regain hit points until the start of I'kok's next turn.

action.name: Holomire Morph
entries: With concentration, I'kok twists an existing Holomire object or Rep he can see within 30 ft. in some way. This can be in a benign or frightening and can be any change so long as the Holomire does not exceed Large size. If purposely frightening, creatures within 15 ft. who see the event must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom save or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage and are {@condition frightened} until the end of I'kok's next turn. Creatures already frightened take double damage on a failure. Reps always fail this save but take no damage.

trait.name: disintegration
entries: The Proto-Incarnation disintegrates anything it comes in contact with. Magical items are unaffected. Objects and creatures fully consumed by the Proto-Incarnations are destroyed completely and can only be restored with a {@spell Wish} spell. Objects and creatures too large to be consumed must make a {@dc 15} dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage. This damage ignores resistance and thresholds
